body_html:
Can you post the commands you used to install Anaconda/Miniconda and PyTorch? Can you run the Python process with LD_DEBUG=libs and post the full log? And finally, can you use locate libcaffe2.so to find all copies of this library on your system and report them here?

I don't really know what is going on with Apport, but I don't think it is too relevant
body_text:
Can you post the commands you used to install Anaconda/Miniconda and PyTorch? Can you run the Python process with LD_DEBUG=libs and post the full log? And finally, can you use locate libcaffe2.so to find all copies of this library on your system and report them here?
I don't really know what is going on with Apport, but I don't think it is too relevant
body:
Can you post the commands you used to install Anaconda/Miniconda and PyTorch? Can you run the Python process with `LD_DEBUG=libs` and post the full log? And finally, can you use `locate libcaffe2.so` to find all copies of this library on your system and report them here?

I don't really know what is going on with Apport, but I don't think it is too relevant
